```{r setup, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(gridExtra)

path = "~/Documents/ETH/Thesis/1plusX/Data/Thesis/Simulation/Results/"
plot_results <- function(algorith_name="Random") {
  
  data <- read.csv(file=paste0(path, paste0(algorith_name, ".csv")), header=TRUE, sep=",")
  data$Percent = data$Clicks / data$Impressions * 100
  data$Factor = paste(data$Method, data$Alpha, sep=" ")

  ggplot(data, aes(x=Impressions, y=Percent, colour=Factor)) + 
  geom_line() + xlab("Impressions") + ylab("% of Clicks") +
  expand_limits(y=c(4,7.5), x=c(0, 75000)) + theme_bw() + ggtitle(algorith_name)
}
  
```

```{r all_algos, include=TRUE, echo=FALSE}

data <- read.csv(file=paste0(path, paste0("EGreedy_Disjoint", ".csv")), header=TRUE, sep=",")

data1 <- read.csv(file=paste0(path, paste0("Random", ".csv")), header=TRUE, sep=",")
data <- rbind(data, data1)
data1 <- read.csv(file=paste0(path, paste0("EGreedy", ".csv")), header=TRUE, sep=",")
data <- rbind(data, data1)
data1 <- read.csv(file=paste0(path, paste0("UCB", ".csv")), header=TRUE, sep=",")
data <- rbind(data, data1)

data$Percent = data$Clicks / data$Impressions * 100
data$Factor = paste(data$Method, data$Alpha, sep=" ")

selected = data[(data$Method == "Random") 
      | (data$Method == "EGreedy" & data$Alpha == 0.1)
      | (data$Method == "EGreedy_Disjoint" & data$Alpha == 0.15)
      | (data$Method == "UCB" & data$Alpha == 0.1) , ]

ggplot(selected, aes(x=Impressions, y=Percent, colour=Factor)) + 
  geom_line() + xlab("Impressions") + ylab("% of Clicks") +
  expand_limits(y=c(4,7.5), x=c(0, 75000)) + theme_bw() + 
  ggtitle("All algorithms with best parameters")

```
